name: Oh, Wyrm!
description:
I'm very excited to present, my first game ever! It's not much (only the demo/test map currently) but I'm very proud of it, so please enjoy what's here!

Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated!

V1.0 includes:

- 1 NPC, with a dialogue system to boot - talk to Cim to get the controls and instructions!

- 3 types of collectables, and 1 secret

- A collectable and to-do (achievements) list to track progress

- A grappling hook (of the "zipline" variety)

- Small "demo" map to play around in

- Settings menu, with accessibility options, as well as a title screen with credits
